publications.title: InsightBench: Evaluating Business Analytics Agents Through Multi-Step Insight Generation
publications.abstract: Comprehensive evaluation framework for business analytics agents through multi-step insight generation. Published at ICLR 2025.

publications.title: NoCSNet: Network-on-Chip Security Analysis Under Thermal DoS Attack With Deep Neural Network
publications.abstract: Deep neural network approach for analyzing Network-on-Chip security under thermal DoS attacks. Published at NoCArc 2024.

publications.title: Tiny-RFNet: Enabling Modulation Classification of Radio Signals on Edge Systems
publications.abstract: Lightweight neural network for modulation classification of radio signals on edge systems. Optimized for Jetson Orin Nano. Published at CPSAT 2024.

publications.title: RFNet: Fast and Efficient Neural Network for Modulation Classification of Radio Frequency Signals
publications.abstract: Fast and efficient neural network for modulation classification of radio frequency signals. Published in ITU Journal 2023.

publications.title: Optimization of Quantized Phase Shifts for Reconfigurable Smart Surfaces Assisted Communication
publications.abstract: Optimization of quantized phase shifts for reconfigurable smart surfaces assisted communication. Published at IEEE CCNC 2022.

publications.title: Emotion Recognition via fMRI-derived Brain States using Deep Neural Network
publications.abstract: Deep neural network approach for emotion recognition using fMRI-derived brain states. Published at IHBM 2020.
